g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;

                       , o_rt_lst   OUT lm_logical_segments%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                           , o_rt_lst   OUT lm_logical_segments%ROWTYPE )

                               , o_rt_lst  OUT lm_logical_segments%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

;

PROCEDURE lst_lock_row_nowait( i_lst_ID   IN  lm_logical_segments.ID%TYPE )

;

FUNCTION lst_update_row( i_lst_ID   IN     lm_logical_segments.ID%TYPE
                       , io_rt_lst  IN OUT lm_logical_segments%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER
;

FUNCTION lst_delete_row( i_lst_ID   IN  lm_logical_segments.ID%TYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;


END lm_lst_tapi_pck;

function lst_select_row( i_lst_id   in  lm_logical_segments.id%type
                       , o_rt_lst   out lm_logical_segments%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lst_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lst ( i_lst_id   in  lm_logical_segments.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_logical_segments lst
            where lst.id = i_lst_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_lst( i_lst_id => i_lst_id );
         fetch c_lst into o_rt_lst;
         l_found := c_lst%found;
         close c_lst;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_lst%isopen
         then
            close c_lst;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lst_select_row;

      is

           from lm_logical_segments lst
          where lst.id_cust = i_lst_id_cust ;

         open c_lst(i_lst_id_cust => i_lst_id_cust);
         fetch c_lst into o_rt_lst;
         l_found := c_lst%found;
         close c_lst;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_lst%isopen
      then
         close c_lst;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc

end lst_select_row_uk1;

function lst_select_row_upd( i_lst_id   in  lm_logical_segments.id%type
                           , o_rt_lst   out lm_logical_segments%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lst_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_lst ( i_lst_id   in  lm_logical_segments.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_logical_segments lst
            where lst.id = i_lst_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_lst( i_lst_id => i_lst_id );
   fetch c_lst into o_rt_lst;
   l_found := c_lst%found;
   close c_lst;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_lst%isopen
      then
         close c_lst;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end lst_select_row_upd;

function lst_select_row_upd_uk1( i_lst_id_cust   in  lm_logical_segments.id_cust%type
                               , o_rt_lst  out lm_logical_segments%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lst_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := lst_select_row_uk1( i_lst_id_cust   =>  i_lst_id_cust
                                   , o_rt_lst => o_rt_lst );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := lst_select_row_upd( i_lst_id => o_rt_lst.id
                                      , o_rt_lst => o_rt_lst );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end lst_select_row_upd_uk1;

procedure lst_lock_row( i_lst_id   in  lm_logical_segments.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lst_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_lst ( i_lst_id   in  lm_logical_segments.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_logical_segments lst
              where lst.id = i_lst_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_lst_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                lst_lock_row_nowait( i_lst_id => i_lst_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_lst( i_lst_id => i_lst_id );
                  close c_lst;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_lst%isopen
         then
            close c_lst;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lst_lock_row;

procedure lst_lock_row_nowait( i_lst_id   in  lm_logical_segments.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lst_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lst ( i_lst_id   in  lm_logical_segments.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_logical_segments lst
               where lst.id = i_lst_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_lst_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_lst( i_lst_id => i_lst_id );

            close c_lst;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_lst%isopen
        then
           close c_lst;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_lst_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lst_lock_row_nowait;

function lst_perform_update( i_lst_id   in     lm_logical_segments.id%type
                           , io_rt_lst  in out lm_logical_segments%rowtype )
return number
;

function lst_perform_delete( i_lst_id   in  lm_logical_segments.id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure lst_insert_row ( io_rt_lst  in out lm_logical_segments%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lst_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_logical_segments( id
                                , id_cust
                                , description
                                , max_holding_capacity
                                , stn_id )
              values ( io_rt_lst.id
                     , io_rt_lst.id_cust
                     , io_rt_lst.description
                     , io_rt_lst.max_holding_capacity
                     , io_rt_lst.stn_id )
           returning id
                   , id_cust
                   , description
                   , max_holding_capacity
                   , stn_id
                into io_rt_lst.id
                   , io_rt_lst.id_cust
                   , io_rt_lst.description
                   , io_rt_lst.max_holding_capacity
                   , io_rt_lst.stn_id;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_lst.id||'"'
                                                             ||', ID_CUST = "'||io_rt_lst.id_cust||'"'
                                                             ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_lst.description||'"'
                                                             ||', MAX_HOLDING_CAPACITY = "'||io_rt_lst.max_holding_capacity||'"'
                                                             ||', STN_ID = "'||io_rt_lst.stn_id||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lst_insert_row;

function lst_perform_update( i_lst_id   in     lm_logical_segments.id%type
                           , io_rt_lst  in out lm_logical_segments%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lst_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_logical_segments
            set id = io_rt_lst.id
              , id_cust = io_rt_lst.id_cust
              , description = io_rt_lst.description
              , max_holding_capacity = io_rt_lst.max_holding_capacity
              , stn_id = io_rt_lst.stn_id
          where id = i_lst_id
      returning id
              , id_cust
              , description
              , max_holding_capacity
              , stn_id
           into io_rt_lst.id
              , io_rt_lst.id_cust
              , io_rt_lst.description
              , io_rt_lst.max_holding_capacity
              , io_rt_lst.stn_id;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_lst.id||'"'
                                                             ||', ID_CUST = "'||io_rt_lst.id_cust||'"'
                                                             ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_lst.description||'"'
                                                             ||', MAX_HOLDING_CAPACITY = "'||io_rt_lst.max_holding_capacity||'"'
                                                             ||', STN_ID = "'||io_rt_lst.stn_id||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lst_perform_update;

function lst_perform_delete( i_lst_id   in  lm_logical_segments.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lst_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_logical_segments
          where id = i_lst_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_lst_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lst_perform_delete;

function lst_update_row( i_lst_id   in     lm_logical_segments.id%type
                       , io_rt_lst  in out lm_logical_segments%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lst_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         lst_lock_row( i_lst_id   =>  i_lst_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            lst_perform_update( i_lst_id   =>  i_lst_id
                              , io_rt_lst  => io_rt_lst );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_lst.id||'"'
                                                          ||', ID_CUST = "'||io_rt_lst.id_cust||'"'
                                                          ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_lst.description||'"'
                                                          ||', MAX_HOLDING_CAPACITY = "'||io_rt_lst.max_holding_capacity||'"'
                                                          ||', STN_ID = "'||io_rt_lst.stn_id||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end lst_update_row;

function lst_delete_row( i_lst_id   in  lm_logical_segments.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lst_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         lst_lock_row( i_lst_id   =>  i_lst_id );

         
         l_deleted := lst_perform_delete( i_lst_id   =>  i_lst_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_lst_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lst_delete_row;


end lm_lst_tapi_pck;
